[without reference to a Main Committee (A/75/L.9 and A/75/L.9/Add.1)] 
 
 
 
75/6. Report of the International Atomic Energy Agency  
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Having received the report of the International Atomic Energy Agency for 
2019,1  
 
Taking note of the statement by the Director General of the Agency, in which he 
provided additional information on the main developments in the activities of the 
Agency during 2020, 
 
Recognizing the importance of the work of the Agency, 
 
Recognizing also the cooperation between the United Nations and the Agency 
and the Agreement governing the relationship between the United Nations and the 
Agency as approved by the General Conference of the Agency on 23 October 1957 
and by the General Assembly in the annex to its resolution 1145 (XII) of 14 November 
1957, 
 
1. 
Takes note with appreciation of the report of the International Atomic 
Energy Agency; 
 
2. 
Takes note of resolutions GC(64)/RES/3 on the Agency and the 
coronavirus disease (COVID-19) pandemic; GC(64)/RES/9 on nuclear and radiation 
safety; GC(64)/RES/10 on nuclear security; GC(64)/RES/11 on the strengthening of 
the Agency’s technical cooperation activities; GC(64)/RES/12 on strengthening the 
Agency’s activities related to nuclear science, technology and applications, 
comprising GC(64)/RES/12 A on non-power nuclear applications, GC(64)/RES/12 B 
on nuclear power applications and GC(64)/RES/12 C on nuclear knowledge 
management; GC(64)/RES/13 on strengthening the effectiveness and improving the 
efficiency of Agency safeguards; GC(64)/RES/14 on the implementation of the

Report of the International Atomic Energy Agency
 
20-15359
2/2 
 
Agreement between the Agency and the Democratic People’s Republic of Korea for 
the application of safeguards in connection with the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation 
of Nuclear Weapons; and GC(64)/RES/15 on the application of Agency safeguards in 
the Middle East; and decisions GC(64)/DEC/10 on the amendment to article XIV.A 
of the statute of the Agency; and GC(64)/DEC/11 on the promotion of efficiency and 
effectiveness of the Agency’s decision-making process, adopted by the General 
Conference of the Agency at its sixty-fourth regular session, held from 21 to 
25 September 2020;  
 
3. 
Reaffirms its strong support for the indispensable role of the Agency in 
encouraging and assisting the development and practical application of atomic energy 
for peaceful uses, in technology transfer to developing countries and in nuclear safety, 
verification and security;  
 
4. 
Welcomes resolution GC(SPL.2)/RES/1 on the approval of the 
appointment of Mr. Rafael Mariano Grossi as Director General of the Agency from 
3 December 2019 to 2 December 2023, adopted by the General Conference of the 
Agency at its second special session, held on 2 December 2019; 
 
5. 
Expresses appreciation for the leadership of the Director General and for 
the professionalism of the staff of the Agency during the COVID-19 pandemic; 
 
6. 
Appeals to Member States to continue to support the activities of the 
Agency; 
 
7. 
Requests the Secretary-General to transmit to the Director General of the 
Agency the records of the seventy-fifth session of the General Assembly relating to 
the activities of the Agency. 
 
23rd plenary meeting 
11 November 2020
